hardy.title:
§7§a[Hardy]§7
When taking damage, gain regeneration for a duration equal to the damage received.

initiateSlowfall.title: §7§a[Innate Slowfall]§7
initiateSlowfall.description: §7When falling long distances you gain Slow Falling.

fervour.title: §7§a[Fervour]§7
fervour.description: §7Landing a killing blow grants you haste for a short duration.

wayfarerStealth.title: §7§a[Stealth]§7
wayfarerStealth.description:
§7Gain Stealth when crouching.

§f(Stealth)§7 causes you to blend into the shadows, avoiding monster detection completely. Dealing or Receiving damage removes stealth.

wayfarerSneak.title: §7§a[Sneak]§7
wayfarerSneak.description:
§7Gain speed when crouching. Sneaking while you have Stealth grants you increasing stacks of Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

wayfarerReflexive.title: §7§a[Reflexive]§7
wayfarerReflexive.description: §7When your Stealth is forcefully broken, you have a chance to trigger the Rogue Evasion Mastery signature ability.

wayfarerUnseen.title: §7§a[Unseen]§7
wayfarerUnseen.description: §7While loading a Crossbow, gain momentary Stealth.

wayfarerGuarding.title: §7§a[Guarding]§7
wayfarerGuarding.description:
§7While you have a Crossbow in your offhand, you periodically gain Barrier.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.

initiateGambit.title: §7§a[Gambit]
initiateGambit.description: §7Your spell damage is reduced by 25%, but your spell critical damage is increased by 75%.

initiateEmpower.title: §7§a[Empower]§7
initiateEmpower.description:
§7Chance on spell cast to gain a stack of Attunement.

§f(Attunement)§7 Increases spell damage for a specific school of magic by 2% per stack.

initiateAttuned.title: §7§a[Attuned]§7
initiateAttuned.description:
§7When you have 5 or more stacks of attunement, periodically convert them into stacks of Precision.

§f(Precision)§7 Increases spell critical damage and critical chance by 2% per stack.

initiateLightningRod.title: §7§a[Lightning Rod]§7
initiateLightningRod.description:
§7During storms, you periodically gain stacks of Lightning Attunement.

§f(Lightning Attunement)§7 Increases spell damage for lightning magic by 2% per stack.

initiateEldritchEnfeeblement.title: §7§a[Eldritch Enfeeblement]§7
initiateEldritchEnfeeblement.description: §7Your spell damage is increased by 5%, but your movespeed is decreased by 15%.

initiateHasty.title: §7§a[Hasty]§7
initiateHasty.description:
§7Your movespeed is increased by 20%, but you are inflicted with immobilize when taking damage.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

initiatePerilousPrecision.title: §7§a[Perilous Precision]§7
initiatePerilousPrecision.description: §7Your spell critical chance is increased by 5%, but your max health is reduced by 15%.

rangerTamer.title: §7§a[Tamer]§7
rangerTamer.description: §7When your pets are near to you, they gain Regeneration & Resistance.

rangerBonded.title: §7§a[Bonded]§7
rangerBonded.description: §7When your pets are near to you and are more healthy than you, they exchange their health with you. Can only trigger when your pet is above 30% HP.

rangerTrained.title: §7§a[Trained]§7
rangerTrained.description: §7When your pets are near to you and have at least 70% HP, they gain Strength & Speed.

rangerIncognito.title: §7§a[Incognito]§7
rangerIncognito.description: §7When your pets are near to you and you gain Stealth, they gain Invisibility.

rogueBackstab.title: §7§a[Backstab]§7
rogueBackstab.description:
§7Attacking enemies from behind inflicts them with weakness.
Also, whilst in proximity to weakened enemies, you have a chance to gain Stealth for a short duration.

warriorHeavyArmorMastery.title: §7§a[Heavy Armor Mastery]§7
warriorHeavyArmorMastery.description: §7While your armor value is above 15, you have a chance to gain Strength when hit.

warriorMediumArmorMastery.title: §7§a[Medium Armor Mastery]§7
warriorMediumArmorMastery.description: §7While your armor value is below 15, you have a chance to gain Absorption when hit.

warriorSpellbreaker.title: §7§a[Spellbreaker]§7
warriorSpellbreaker.description:
§7When taking damage, you have a chance to gain Spellbreaking for a short duration.

§f(Spellbreaking)§7 causes hostile spell projectiles to explode when in close proximity to you.

warriorGoliath.title: §7§a[Goliath]§7
warriorGoliath.description:
§7When falling long distances, gain Earthshaker.

§f(Earthshaker)§7 causes you to damage and knockback surrounding enemies when landing on the ground. This damage scales with your armor value.

warriorHeavyWeight.title: §7§a[Heavy Weight]§7
warriorHeavyWeight.description: §7Your Earthshaker effects are enhanced, causing them to deal additional damage the longer you are in the air.

warriorBound.title: §7§a[Bound]§7
warriorBound.description: §7After activating Earthshaker, you gain Jump Boost for a short duration.

warriorDeathDefy.title: §7§a[Death Defy]§7
warriorDeathDefy.description:
§7When at low HP, you gain Regeneration and Exhaustion relative to your remaining health percent.

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by 1% per stack.

warriorFrenzy.title: §7§a[Frenzy]§7
warriorFrenzy.description:
§7Gain 75% increased Melee Damage, but each time you hit an enemy you gain a stack of exhaustion.

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by 1% per stack.

warriorCarnage.title: §7§a[Carnage]§7
warriorCarnage.description:
§7While at or above 75 stacks of Rage or Exhaustion, gain Health Boost and Immobilizing Aura.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

warriorTwinstrike.title: §7§a[Twinstrike]§7
warriorTwinstrike.description:
§7Your melee hits have a chance to strike twice.
This chance is doubled while under the effects of Health Boost.

warriorSwordfall.title: §7§a[Swordfall]§7
warriorSwordfall.description:
§7Your melee hits have a chance to call down a sword from the sky, dealing damage to your target and all nearby enemies.
This chance is doubled while under the effects of Might.

berserkerPath.title: Path of the §bBerserker§7
berserkerPath.description:
§7§a[Recklessness]§7
When your HP rises above 70% you are inflicted with pulsing weakness.

Also, when dealing or receiving damage you gain a stack of Rage.

§f(Rage)§7 Grants 0.5% increased melee damage, attack speed, and damage taken per stack, up to a maximum of 100 stacks.
While above 25 stacks of Rage you rapidly lose stacks of Exhaustion.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
berserkerPath.extra_description: §7The §bBerserker§7, is driven by an insatiable thirst for destruction and a complete disregard for their own safety. They are masters of §amelee combat§7 and revel in dealing devastating damage, even if it means §aputting their own life on the line§7.

berserkerSwordMastery.title: §7§a[Sword Mastery]§7
berserkerSwordMastery.description: §7Gain pulsing Speed when wielding a sword in your mainhand.

berserkerSwordMasteryProficient.title: §7§a[Sword Mastery +]§7
berserkerSwordMasteryProficient.description: §7Gain increased pulsing Speed when wielding a sword in your mainhand.

berserkerSwordMasterySkilled.title: §7§a[Sword Mastery ++]§7
berserkerSwordMasterySkilled.description:
§7When not dual wielding, gain pulsing Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

berserkerAxeMastery.title: §7§a[Axe Mastery]§7
berserkerAxeMastery.description: §7Gain pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.

berserkerAxeMasteryProficient.title: §7§a[Axe Mastery +]§7
berserkerAxeMasteryProficient.description: §7Gain increased pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.

berserkerAxeMasterySkilled.title: §7§a[Axe Mastery ++]§7
berserkerAxeMasterySkilled.description: §7Gain increased pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.

berserkerIgnorePain.title: §7§a[Ignore Pain]§7
berserkerIgnorePain.description: §7When your HP drops below 40% you gain pulsing resistance.

berserkerIgnorePainProficient.title: §7§a[Ignore Pain +]§7
berserkerIgnorePainProficient.description: §7When your HP drops below 40% you gain increased pulsing resistance.

berserkerIgnorePainSkilled.title: §7§a[Ignore Pain ++]§7
berserkerIgnorePainSkilled.description: §7When your HP drops below 40% you gain increased pulsing resistance.

berserkerRecklessness.title: §7§a[Recklessness]§7
berserkerRecklessness.description:
§7When your HP rises above 70% you are inflicted with pulsing weakness.

Also, when dealing or receiving damage you gain a stack of Rage.

§f(Rage)§7 Grants 0.5% increased melee damage, attack speed, and damage taken per stack, up to a maximum of 100 stacks.
While above 25 stacks of Rage you rapidly lose stacks of Exhaustion.

berserkerChallenge.title: §7§a[Challenge]§7
berserkerChallenge.description: §7Gain a stack of haste for each nearby enemy.

berserkerExploit.title: §7§a[Exploit]§7
berserkerExploit.description: §7Hitting immobilized enemies inflicts them with weakness.

bulwarkShieldMastery.title: §7§a[Shield Mastery]§7
bulwarkShieldMastery.description: §7Gain weakness & resistance when wielding a shield.

bulwarkShieldMasteryProficient.title: §7§a[Shield Mastery +]§7
bulwarkShieldMasteryProficient.description: §7Gain weakness & increased resistance when wielding a shield.

bulwarkShieldMasterySkilled.title: §7§a[Shield Mastery ++]§7
bulwarkShieldMasterySkilled.description: §7Gain weakness & increased resistance when wielding a shield.

bulwarkRebuke.title: §7§a[Rebuke]§7
bulwarkRebuke.description: §725% Chance on block to inflict your attacker with weakness.

wayfarerSlender.title: §7§a[Slender]§7
wayfarerSlender.description: §7When you have 15 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness.

roguePath.title: Path of the §bRogue§7
roguePath.description:
§7
§7§a[Slender]§7
When you have 15 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
roguePath.extra_description: §7The §bRogue§7 is a master of §astealth§7 and subterfuge. They thrive in the shadows, utilizing their exceptional skills to remain unseen and catch their enemies off guard with §aprecision strikes§7. If caught in the open, they are more than capable of §aevading§7 enemy attacks and escaping back to the safety of the shadows.

rogueSmokeBomb.title: §7§a[Smoke Bomb]§7
rogueSmokeBomb.description:
§7Chance to blind nearby enemies and gain Immobilizing Aura when hit.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

rogueOpportunisticMastery.title: §7§a[Opportunistic Mastery]§7
rogueOpportunisticMastery.description: §7Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a short duration.

rogueOpportunisticMasteryProficient.title: §7§a[Opportunistic Mastery +]§7
rogueOpportunisticMasteryProficient.description: §7Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a moderate duration.

rogueOpportunisticMasterySkilled.title: §7§a[Opportunistic Mastery ++]§7
rogueOpportunisticMasterySkilled.description: §7Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a long duration.

rogueEvasionMastery.title: §7§a[Evasion Mastery]§7
rogueEvasionMastery.description: §7When below the armor threshold of the Wayfarer Slender passive, you have a 15% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.

rogueEvasionMasteryProficient.title: §7§a[Evasion Mastery +]§7
rogueEvasionMasteryProficient.description: §7When below the armor threshold of the Wayfarer Slender passive, you have a 20% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.

rogueEvasionMasterySkilled.title: §7§a[Evasion Mastery ++]§7
rogueEvasionMasterySkilled.description: §7When below the armor threshold of the Wayfarer Slender passive, you have a 25% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.

rogueExploitation.title: §7§a[Exploitation]§7
rogueExploitation.description:
§7While under the effects of stealth, your back attacks inflict Death Mark.

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by 25% per stack.

rogueRecovery.title: §7§a[Recovery]§7
rogueRecovery.description: §7When you gain Stealth, you also gain Regeneration.

rogueShadowVeil.title: §7§a[Shadow Veil]§7
rogueShadowVeil.description: §7While under the effects of Stealth, you periodically gain increasing Resistance.

rogueDeflection.title: §7§a[Deflection]§7
rogueDeflection.description: §7When dual wielding weapons §f(axes do not count)§7, the base evasion chance of your Evasion Mastery passive is increased by 10%.

rogueFleetfooted.title: §7§a[Fleetfooted]§7
rogueFleetfooted.description: §7When you are forcefully removed from Stealth, you gain momentary Speed.

rangerPath.title: Path of the §bRanger§7
rangerPath.description:
§7§a[Slender]§7 
When you have 15 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
rangerPath.extra_description: §7The §bRanger§7 is renowned for their unparalleled §aproficiency with bows§7 and their unique ability to infuse §aelemental magic§7 into their ranged attacks. They also share a deep, symbiotic bond with their §aanimal companions§7, making them a formidable force on the battlefield.

initiateFrail.title: §7§a[Frail]§7
initiateFrail.description: §7When you have 10 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness. Also, you cannot effectively use weapons with more than 6 Attack Power.

initiateWhisperedWizardry.title: §7§a[Whispered Wizardry]§7
initiateWhisperedWizardry.description:
§7Casting a spell while you have Stealth grants you several stacks of Spellforged for a few seconds.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants 1 Spell Power per stack.

initiateSpellcloak.title: §7§a[Spellcloak]§7
initiateSpellcloak.description:
§7Casting a spell grants you brief Stealth, as long as you aren't currently Revealed.

§f(Stealth)§7 causes you to blend into the shadows, avoiding monster detection completely. Dealing or Receiving damage removes stealth.

initiateOverload.title: §7§a[Overload]§7
initiateOverload.description:
§7Casting a spell grants you a stack of Overload for a short duration.

§f(Overload)§7 grants you 45% increased spell crit damage & 10% spell crit chance per stack.
Upon exceeding 5 stacks you overload, dealing significant magic damage to yourself and nearby enemies.

The damage dealt to enemies is scaled by your max HP and Soul spell power.

crusaderPath.title: Path of the §bCrusader§7
crusaderPath.description:
§e[Requires §nPaladins & Priests§r§e to be installed]§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
crusaderPath.extra_description: §7The §bCrusader§7, is often chosen by those who are not content with merely §adefending their allies§7 but also strive to be a beacon of hope on the battlefield. They combine the fervor of a §ahealer§7 with the might of a §awarrior§7, making them formidable champions in both §aoffense and defense§7.

spellbladePath.title: Path of the §bSpellblade§7
spellbladePath.extra_description: §7The §bSpellblade§7 is a versatile and formidable warrior who seamlessly melds the power of magic with martial combat. Their hallmark is the fusion of §aspellcasting§7 and §amelee attacks§7, making them an exceptional force on the battlefield.

spellbladeWeaponExpert.title: §7§a[Weapon Expert]§7
spellbladeWeaponExpert.description:
§7Gain a stack of Might when casting a spell. Occasionally gain a stack of Spellforged as well.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants 1 Spell Power per stack.

spellbladeSpellweaving.title: §7§a[Spellweaving]§7
spellbladeSpellweaving.description: §7You now have a 15% chance to summon a random spell when you hit an enemy.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurge.title: Signature Ability: §6[Elemental Surge]§7
spellbladeSignatureElementalSurge.description:
Grants you Elemental Surge for 15s.

§f(Elemental Surge)§7 causes you to periodically release elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoFrost.title: §f[Remove Frost]
spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoFrost.description:
§7Removes Frost Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoFire.title: §f[Remove Fire]
spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoFire.description:
§7Removes Fire Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeRenewal.title: §f[Renewal]
spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeRenewal.description: §7Hitting enemies while you have §6[Elemental Surge]§7 has a 15% chance to extend the its duration by 3 seconds.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoLight.title: §f[Remove Lightning]
spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoLight.description:
§7Removes Lightning Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

spellbladeSignatureElementalImpact.title: Signature Ability: §6[Elemental Impact]§7
spellbladeSignatureElementalImpact.description:
Causes you to dash forward with extreme power, releasing elemental explosions as you move.

§a30s Cooldown§7

spellbladeSignatureElementalImpactMagnet.title: §f[Magnet]
spellbladeSignatureElementalImpactMagnet.description: §7Your §6[Elemental Impact]§7 now pulls nearby enemies into the path of impact.

spellbladeSignatureElementalImpactResist.title: §f[Resistance]
spellbladeSignatureElementalImpactResist.description: §7Your §6[Elemental Impact]§7 now also grants you brief resistance.

spellbladeSignatureSpellweaver.title: Signature Ability: §6[Spellweaver]§7
spellbladeSignatureSpellweaver.description:
Doubles the chance of your Spellweaving passive for 25s.

§a40s Cooldown§7

spellbladeSignatureSpellweaverHaste.title: §f[Haste]
spellbladeSignatureSpellweaverHaste.description: §7Your Spellweaving procs now grant you 5s of Haste stacking up to 5 times.

spellbladeSignatureSpellweaverRegenerati.title: §f[Regeneration]
spellbladeSignatureSpellweaverRegenerati.description: §7Your Spellweaving procs now have a 50% chance to grant you regeneration for 5s.

wizardPath.title: Path of the §bWizard§7
wizardPath.description:
§7§a[Frail]§7
When you have 10 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness. Also, you cannot effectively use weapons with more than 6 Attack Power.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
wizardPath.extra_description: §7The §bWizard§7 specialization is for those who seek to harness the power of magics. They are relentless and destructive §aspellcasters§7, capable of unleashing cataclysmic magical energy upon their enemies. However, their lust for power over the arcane leads them to §aneglect their physical form§7, weakening their defences and physical offence capabilities.

clericPath.title: Path of the §bCleric§7
clericPath.description:
§e[Requires §nPaladins & Priests§r§e to be installed]§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
clericPath.extra_description: §7Those of the §bCleric§7 specialisation are known for their unwavering commitment to safeguarding and nurturing their allies. They possess a unique combination of §ahealing§7, §asupport§7, and the ability to §abear the burdens§7 of those they protect.

wizardPassiveSpellEcho.title: §7§a[Spell Echo]§7
wizardPassiveSpellEcho.description: §7Your spell hits have a chance to echo, casting an additional random spell at the target.

wizardSignatureMeteorShower.title: Signature Ability: §6[Meteor Shower]§7
wizardSignatureMeteorShower.description:
§7
Calls down meteors on nearby enemies.

§a40s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerGreater.title: §f[Greater]§7
wizardSignatureMeteorShowerGreater.description: §7§6[Meteor Shower]§7 Now summons a single larger meteor that deals significantly more damage in a larger area.

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerWrath.title: §f[Wrath]
wizardSignatureMeteorShowerWrath.description:
§7Casting §6[Meteor Shower]§7 now grants you 10 stacks of Meteoric Wrath.

§f(Meteoric Wrath)§7 periodically summons meteors above nearby enemies.

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.title: §f[Renewal]
wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.description: §7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 10% chance to not consume a stack.

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.title: §f[Renewal +]
wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.description: §7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 30% chance to not consume a stack.

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.title: §f[Renewal ++]
wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.description: §7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 50% chance to not consume a stack.

wizardSignatureIceComet.title: Signature Ability: §6[Ice Comet]§7
wizardSignatureIceComet.description:
§7
Calls down an Ice Comet that deals damage to and slows enemies in a large radius.

§a30s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureIceCometLeap.title: §f[Leap]
wizardSignatureIceCometLeap.description: §7Casting §6[Ice Comet]§7 now causes you to leap backwards and gain momentary slow falling.

wizardSignatureIceCometVolley.title: §f[Volley]
wizardSignatureIceCometVolley.description:
§7Casting §6[Ice Comet]§7 now grants you 6 stacks of frost volley.

§f(Frost Volley)§7 causes you to periodically summon Frost Bolts at nearby or targeted enemies.

wizardSignatureIceCometDamage+.title: §f[Greater]
wizardSignatureIceCometDamage+.description: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals more damage & knockback.

wizardSignatureIceCometDamage++.title: §f[Greater +]
wizardSignatureIceCometDamage++.description: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals much more damage & knockback.

wizardSignatureIceCometDamage+++.title: §f[Greater ++]
wizardSignatureIceCometDamage+++.description: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals significantly more damage & knockback.

wizardSignatureStaticDischarge.title: Signature Ability: §6[Static Discharge]§7
wizardSignatureStaticDischarge.description:
§7
Releases a high damage electrical discharge at your target, inflicting them with weakness.

§a35s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLightningB.title: §f[Ball Lightning]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLightningB.description:
§6[Static Discharge]§7 no longer leaps, but instead summons a slow-moving ball of lightning that periodically discharges electricity at nearby hostiles.

All passives that would usually activate from a leap, now activate when the Lightning Ball discharges at enemies.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap.title: §f[Leap]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap.description: §7Your §6[Discharge]§7 can now leap between nearby enemies.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap++.title: §f[Leap +]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap++.description: §7Your §6[Static Discharge]§7 gains additional leaps before expiring.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap+++.title: §f[Leap ++]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap+++.description: §7Your §6[Static Discharge]§7 gains significantly more leaps before expiring.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed.title: §f[Speed]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed.description: §7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 5% chance to gain speed.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed++.title: §f[Speed +]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed++.description: §7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 10% chance to gain speed.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed+++.title: §f[Speed ++]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed+++.description: §7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 15% chance to gain speed.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLightningO.title: §f[Lightning Orb]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLightningO.description:
§7In addition to gaining speed, you also have a chance to summon a Lightning Orb that orbits you erratically, dealing damage to enemies it passes through.

For each Lightning Orb in your vicinity, gain a stack of Soulshock.

§f(Soulshock)§7 grants you +2 Soul & Lightning spell power per stack.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLightningO.title: §f[On Hit]
wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLightningO.description: §7Your Lightning Orb hits can now activate on-cast spell effects, such as Spell Echo.

wizardSignatureArcaneBolt.title: Signature Ability: §6[Arcane Bolt]§7
wizardSignatureArcaneBolt.description:
§7
Fires a concentrated bolt of arcane energy at your target.

§a35s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureArcaneBoltLesser.title: §f[Lesser]
wizardSignatureArcaneBoltLesser.description: §7Your §6[Arcane Bolt]§7 now fires multiple Lesser Arcane Bolts in a larger area. These bolts move faster and have less damage.

wizardSignatureArcaneBoltVolley.title: §f[Volley]
wizardSignatureArcaneBoltVolley.description:
§7Casting §6[Arcane Bolt]§7 now grants you 10 stacks of Arcane Volley. 
 
§f(Arcane Volley)§7 causes you to rapidly cast Lesser Arcane Bolts at targeted enemies.

wizardSignatureArcaneBoltGreater.title: §f[Greater]
wizardSignatureArcaneBoltGreater.description:
§7You now cast a §6[Greater Arcane Bolt]§7 that deals increased damage. 
 
This does not affect Lesser Arcane Bolts.

shamanSignatureAstralTotem.title: Signature Ability: §6[Astral Totem]§7
shamanSignatureAstralTotem.description:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental comets on nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

shamanSignatureNovaTotem.title: Signature Ability: §6[Nova Totem]§7
shamanSignatureNovaTotem.description:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7

shamanSignatureBoltTotem.title: Signature Ability: §6[Bolt Totem]§7
shamanSignatureBoltTotem.description:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically fires elemental bolts at nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

rogueSignatureEvasion.title: Signature Ability: §6[Evasion]§7
rogueSignatureEvasion.description:
§7
The effects of your Evasion Mastery passive are doubled for 8s.

§a25s Cooldown§7

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBlades.title: §f[Fan of Blades]
rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBlades.description:
§7§6[Evasion]§7 Now also grants you 10 stacks of Fan of Blades.

§f(Fan of Blades)§7 causes you to throw daggers at enemies in front of you.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesDisencha.title: §f[Disenchant]
rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesDisencha.description:
§7Your Fan of Blades now also inflict enemies with Disenchantment.

§f(Disenchantment)§7 periodically strips buffs from the victim.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesAssault.title: §f[Assault]
rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesAssault.description: §7You now gain 20 stacks of Fan of Blades with increased throw frequency but decreased damage.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesRenewal.title: §f[Renewal]
rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesRenewal.description: §7Gain two stacks of Fan of Blades on kill.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesBladesto.title: §f[Bladestorm]
rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesBladesto.description:
§7For each enemy hit by Fan of Blades, gain a stack of Bladestorm, up to 20 stacks.

§f(Bladestorm)§7 causes daggers to rotate around you, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Each stack of Bladestorm increases its attack frequency and grants you 1% additional evasion chance.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesBladesto.title: §f[Siphon]
rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesBladesto.description:
§7Bladestorm now has a chance to siphon health when it hits.

§f(Bladestorm)§7 causes daggers to rotate around you, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Each stack of Bladestorm increases its attack frequency and grants you 1% additional evasion chance.

rogueSignaturePreparation.title: Signature Ability: §6[Preparation]§7
rogueSignaturePreparation.description:
§7
Gain Stealth and Speed 3 for 8s.

§a10s Cooldown§7

rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrike.title: §f[Shadowstrike]
rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrike.description: §7§6[Preparation]§7 now causes you to dash forward at lightning speed, dealing mainhand damage to enemies in your path.

rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrikeVam.title: §f[Vampire]
rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrikeVam.description:
§7You steal buffs from enemies caught within the path of your dash and inflict them with Death Mark.

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by 25% per stack.

rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrikeShi.title: §f[Shield]
rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrikeShi.description:
§7§6[Preparation]§7 now grants you Barrier and cleanses you of any Revealed stacks.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikes.title: Signature Ability: §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7
rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikes.description:
§7
Gain 10 stacks of Siphoning Strikes.

§f(Siphoning Strikes)§7 causes you to siphon health health and strip buffs from your enemies on hit.

§a25s Cooldown§7

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesMighty.title: §f[Mighty]
rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesMighty.description:
§7When you gain §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 you also gain Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesAura.title: §f[Aura]
rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesAura.description:
§7When you gain §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 you also gain Immobilizing Aura.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesVanish.title: §f[Vanish]
rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesVanish.description: §7Your §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 also cleanse you of all stacks of Revealed on hit.

rangerSignatureArrowRain.title: Signature Ability: §6[Arrow Rain]§7
rangerSignatureArrowRain.description:
§7
Gain one stack of Arrow Rain. 
 
§f(Arrow Rain)§7 causes your next fully-charged bow attack will summon a rain of arrows at the targeted area.

§a14s Cooldown§7

rangerSignatureArrowRainElemental.title: §f[Elemental]
rangerSignatureArrowRainElemental.description:
§7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 is now elementally enhanced and deals additional elemental damage.
This effect is reduced when enemies are in close proximity.

rangerSignatureArrowRainElementalArtille.title: §f[Artillery]
rangerSignatureArrowRainElementalArtille.description: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now creates additional elemental arrows that home toward enemies near the impact area.

rangerSignatureArrowRainEplosive.title: §f[Minefield]
rangerSignatureArrowRainEplosive.description: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now leaves behind proximity explosive arrows.

rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley+.title: §f[Volley]
rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley+.description: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires one additional volley.

rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley++.title: §f[Volley +]
rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley++.description: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires two additional volleys.

rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley+++.title: §f[Volley ++]
rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley+++.description: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires three additional volleys.

rangerSignatureDisengage.title: Signature Ability: §6[Disengage]§7
rangerSignatureDisengage.description:
§7
Slow nearby enemies and leap backwards.

§a15s Cooldown§7

rangerSignatureDisengageRecuperate.title: §f[Recuperate]
rangerSignatureDisengageRecuperate.description: §7§6[Disengage]§7 now heals all nearby pets to full health.

rangerSignatureDisengageExploitation.title: §f[Aura]
rangerSignatureDisengageExploitation.description:
§7§6[Disengage]§7 now grants all nearby pets Immobilizing Aura for a short duration. 

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

rangerSignatureDisengageMarksman.title: §f[Marksman]
rangerSignatureDisengageMarksman.description:
§7§6[Disengage]§7 now grants you a stack of Marksman. 

§f(Marksman)§7 Causes your next fully charged ranged attack to fire a marksman arrow, dealing high damage and inflicting the target with Death Mark. 

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by 25% per stack.

rangerSignatureElementalArrows.title: Signature Ability: §6[Elemental Arrows]§7
rangerSignatureElementalArrows.description:
§7
Gain 5 stacks of Elemental Arrows.

§f(Elemental Arrows)§7 Causes your next fully charged ranged attack to fire several elemental arrows at enemies in the targeted area.

§a40s Cooldown§7

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsFrostAttun.title: §f[Frost Attune]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsFrostAttun.description: §7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be frost attuned.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsFireAttune.title: §f[Fire Attune]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsFireAttune.description: §7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be fire attuned.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsLightningA.title: §f[Lightning Attune]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsLightningA.description: §7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be lightning attuned.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius+.title: §f[Radius]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius+.description: §7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 2.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius++.title: §f[Radius +]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius++.description: §7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 4.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius+++.title: §f[Radius ++]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius+++.description: §7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 6.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks+.title: §f[Quantity]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks+.description: §7You gain one additional stack of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks++.title: §f[Quantity +]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks++.description: §7You gain two additional stacks of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks+++.title: §f[Quantity ++]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks+++.description: §7You gain three additional stacks of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRenewal.title: §f[Renewal]
rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRenewal.description: §7You have a 35% chance on kill to gain a stack of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

necromancerSignatureEnrage.title: Signature Ability: §6[Enrage]§7
necromancerSignatureEnrage.description:
§7
Send nearby minions into a frenzy, granting them speed, strength and resistance.

§a30s Cooldown§7

necromancerSignatureSacrifice.title: Signature Ability: §6[Sacrifice]§77
necromancerSignatureSacrifice.description:
§7
Sacrifice nearby minions, gaining a stack of strength, haste, and resistance for each minion sacrificed.

§a30s Cooldown§7

necromancerSignatureSpectralGrasp.title: Signature Ability: §6[Spectral Grasp]§7
necromancerSignatureSpectralGrasp.description:
§7
Damage your target and pull them towards you, inflicting them with slowness & mining fatigue.

§a30s Cooldown§7

frostguardSignatureConjuringStrikes.title: Signature Ability: §6[Conjuring Strikes]§7
frostguardSignatureConjuringStrikes.description:
§7
Gain 6 stacks of Conjuring Strikes.

§a30s Cooldown§7

frostguardSignatureFrostNova.title: Signature Ability: §6[Frost Nova]§7
frostguardSignatureFrostNova.description:
§7
Release a Frost Nova, damaging and slowing nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

crusaderAegis.title: §7§a[Aegis]§7
crusaderAegis.description: §7Periodically consume stacks of exhaustion to gain a stack of Divine Protection.

crusaderRetribution.title: §7§a[Retribution]§7
crusaderRetribution.description: §7Chance on shield block to cast Judgement on your attacker.

crusaderExhaustiveRecovery.title: §7§a[Exhaustive Recovery]§7
crusaderExhaustiveRecovery.description:
§7Chance on shield block to instant-cast Flash Heal on yourself and gain several stacks of exhaustion.

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by 1% per stack.

crusaderSignatureConsecration.title: Signature Ability: §6[Consecration]§7
crusaderSignatureConsecration.description:
§7
Gain Consecration for 15s.

§f(Consecration)§7 consecrate the ground beneath your feet, dealing damage to enemies while healing allies. Damage & Healing scales with Healing Spell Power.

§a30s Cooldown§7

crusaderSignatureConsecrationWard.title: §f[Ward]
crusaderSignatureConsecrationWard.description: Your §6[Consecration]§7 now wards away undead hostiles.

crusaderSignatureConsecrationTaunt.title: §f[Taunt]
crusaderSignatureConsecrationTaunt.description:
Your §6[Consecration]§7 now taunts affected hostiles.

§f(Taunted)§7 taunted enemies are forced to attack the taunting entity.

crusaderSignatureConsecrationMighty.title: §f[Mighty]
crusaderSignatureConsecrationMighty.description:
Your §6[Consecration]§7 now periodically grants nearby allies Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

crusaderSignatureConsecrationSpellforged.title: §f[Spellforged]
crusaderSignatureConsecrationSpellforged.description:
Your §6[Consecration]§7 now periodically grants nearby allies Spellforged.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants 1 Spell Power per stack.

crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaught.title: Signature Ability: §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7
crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaught.description:
§7
Charge forward. If blocking during the charge, you deal damage based on your armor value and knock back enemies.

§a15s Cooldown§7

crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtHeal.title: §f[Heal]
crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtHeal.description:
Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 heals allies it passes through, and grants them Divine Protection.

Healing scales off Healing Spell Power

crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtDefend.title: §f[Defend]
crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtDefend.description: Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 also grants you Divine Protection for a duration.

crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtMighty.title: §f[Mighty]
crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtMighty.description: Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 also grants you Might for a duration.

crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtStun.title: §f[Stun]
crusaderSignatureSacredOnslaughtStun.description: Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 also stuns enemies, so long as you hold block while advancing.

crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCall.title: Signature Ability: §6[Heavensmith's Call]§7
crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCall.description:
§7
Call down an anvil from the heavens to crush your foes.

§a55s Cooldown§7

crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallTaunt.title: §f[Taunt]
crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallTaunt.description:
§6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 Now Taunts the primary target.§7

§f(Taunted)§7 taunted enemies are forced to attack the taunting entity.

crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallMark.title: §f[Death Mark]
crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallMark.description:
§6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 Now inflicts the primary target with Death Mark.

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by 25% per stack.

crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallEffect.title: §f[Divine Adjudication]
crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallEffect.description:
§6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 Now grants you Divine Adjudication for a duration.§7

§f(Divine Adjudication)§7 periodically cast Judgement on nearby enemies.

crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallEffectE.title: §f[Recuperate]
crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallEffectE.description: §7Divine Adjudication granted to you by §6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 now cleanses stacks of Exhaustion from you when it triggers.

crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallEffectM.title: §f[Mighty]
crusaderSignatureHeavensmithsCallEffectM.description: §7Divine Adjudication granted to you by §6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 now grants you stacks of Might when it triggers.

clericAltruism.title: §7§a[Altruism]§7
clericAltruism.description:
§7When wearing less than 10 points of armor, you periodically generate Spellforged stacks.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants 1 Spell Power per stack.

clericMutualMending.title: §7§a[Mutual Mending]§7
clericMutualMending.description: §7When casting a healing spell, you have a chance to also cast that spell on yourself.

clericHealingWard.title: §7§a[Healing Ward]§7
clericHealingWard.description:
§7When casting a healing spell to grant your target Barrier.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.

clericSignatureSacredOrb.title: Signature Ability: §6[Sacred Orb]§7
clericSignatureSacredOrb.description:
§7
Release an orb of holy energy that flies forward before seeking out a nearby ally.
When this orb connects with an ally, it heals them and grants you both Vitality Bond.

§f(Vitality Bond)§7 equalises the HP of the affected entities for its duration.

§a30s Cooldown§7

clericSignatureSacredOrbSpeed.title: §f[Speed]
clericSignatureSacredOrbSpeed.description: §7Vitality Bond granted by your §6[Sacred Orb]§7 now also buffs the recipient with attack & movespeed, but inflicts you with Mining Fatigue.

clericSignatureSacredOrbDebuffs.title: §f[Compassion]
clericSignatureSacredOrbDebuffs.description: §7Vitality Bond granted by your §6[Sacred Orb]§7 now also causes debuffs affecting the recipient to periodically transfer to you.

clericSignatureSacredOrbBuffs.title: §f[Benevolence]
clericSignatureSacredOrbBuffs.description: §7Vitality Bond granted by your §6[Sacred Orb]§7 now also periodically grants copies of your buffs to the recipient.

clericSignatureDivineIntervention.title: Signature Ability: §6[Divine Intervention]§7
clericSignatureDivineIntervention.description:
§7
Call down a bolt of celestial energy from the heavens, healing your target and granting them Undying.

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.

§a45s Cooldown§7

clericSignatureDivineInterventionFireRes.title: §f[Fire Resistance]
clericSignatureDivineInterventionFireRes.description: §7Your §6[Divine Intervention]§7 also grants the target Fire Resistance for its duration.

clericSignatureDivineInterventionMight.title: §f[Mighty]
clericSignatureDivineInterventionMight.description:
§7Your §6[Divine Intervention]§7 also grants the target Might for its duration.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

clericSignatureDivineInterventionSpellfo.title: §f[Spellforged]
clericSignatureDivineInterventionSpellfo.description:
§7Your §6[Divine Intervention]§7 also grants the target Spellforged for its duration.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants 1 Spell Power per stack.

clericSignatureAnointWeapon.title: Signature Ability: §6[Anoint Weapon]§7
clericSignatureAnointWeapon.description:
§7
Anoint your weapon with a sacred oil.

§f(Anoint Weapon)§7 causes your attacks to deal AoE holy damage, and periodically heal nearby allies.
AoE damage scales with Healing Power.

§a35s Cooldown§7

clericSignatureAnointWeaponResistance.title: §f[Resistance]
clericSignatureAnointWeaponResistance.description: §7Your §6[Anoint Weapon]§7 now also grants you Resistance on hits.

clericSignatureAnointWeaponUndying.title: §f[Undying]
clericSignatureAnointWeaponUndying.description:
§7While your §6[Anoint Weapon]§7 is active, taking damage while below 30% HP has a chance to grant you Undying.

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.

clericSignatureAnointWeaponCleanse.title: §f[Cleanse]
clericSignatureAnointWeaponCleanse.description: §7While your §6[Anoint Weapon]§7 is active, you periodically cleanse yourself of debuffs.

berserkerSignatureRampage.title: Signature Ability: §6[Rampage]§7
berserkerSignatureRampage.description:
§7
Gain Rampage for 15s.

§f(Rampage)§7 grants you random buffs each time you take damage.

§a30s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureRampageCharge.title: §f[Charge]
berserkerSignatureRampageCharge.description: §7§6[Rampage]§7 now immediately grants you regeneration and resistance and causes you to barrel forward, dealing damage and knocking back enemies.

berserkerSignatureRampageChargeRelentles.title: §f[Relentless]
berserkerSignatureRampageChargeRelentles.description: §7When your charge deals damage, you convert your stacks of Exhaustion into Strength.

berserkerSignatureRampageChargeImmob.title: §f[Immobilize]
berserkerSignatureRampageChargeImmob.description:
§7Enemies hit by your charge are also inflicted with Immobilize. 

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

berserkerSignatureBloodthirsty.title: Signature Ability: §6[Bloodthirsty]§7
berserkerSignatureBloodthirsty.description:
§7
Gain Bloodthirsty for 20s.

§f(Bloodthirsty)§7 grants you 25% of your max health each time you defeat an enemy.

§a25s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyMighty.title: §f[Mighty]
berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyMighty.description:
§7§6[Bloodthirsty]§7 Now grants you Might on use.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyTireless.title: §f[Tireless]
berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyTireless.description: §7While §6[Bloodthirsty]§7 is active, you have a chance to remove stacks of Exhaustion on hit.

berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyTremor.title: §f[Tremor]
berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyTremor.description:
§7While §6[Bloodthirsty]§7 is active, you have a chance to gain Earthshaker on hit.

§f(Earthshaker)§7 causes you to damage and knockback surrounding enemies when landing on the ground. This damage scales with your armor value.

berserkerSignatureBerserking.title: Signature Ability: §6[Berserking]§7
berserkerSignatureBerserking.description:
§7
Sacrifice 30% Total HP. Gain Berserking for a duration equal to the amount of hearts lost.

§f(Berserking)§7 grants you stacking offensive buffs each time you hit an enemy.

§a25s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeap.title: §f[Leap Slam]
berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeap.description: §7§6[Berserking]§7 now causes you to perform a forward leap slam, damaging and knocking back enemies at the landing location.

berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeapImmob.title: §f[Immobilize]
berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeapImmob.description:
§7Leap Slam now also inflicts enemies with Immobilize.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeapPull.title: §f[Magnet]
berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeapPull.description: §7Leap Slam now pulls nearby enemies instead of knocking them back.

portalSapphire.title: §7§6[Junction: §fSapphire§6]§7
portalSapphire.description:
§7
Unlocks Junction nodes of the same type, allowing you to more easily traverse the skill tree.
